overview: An unprecedented new spiritual experience horror that incorporates real psychic images!! In response to a request to investigate the psychic phenomenon of a building, film director Matsunosuke Ami started the investigation. However, at the mercy of strange relationships swirling there, the secrets of past incidents, it is extremely difficult to explore. Meanwhile, we finally conducted a demonstration experiment. So I succeeded in capturing nine psychic phenomena. And the story will reach the climax of unexpected facts and horror!!
title: Shinreion The Movie
